text: (My life is always the same, working a boring nine to five job, not really going out or doing anything interesting.)
(I finally decided to take a break and enjoy myself, I took a vacation from work, got my car and went to the beach to relax.)
(Ah, the sun on my face, the sand underneath my feet and a nice drink to top it off, no better way to spend some me-time.)
(I could go for a little swim, I just hope I didn't forget how.)
(Hmmm, looks like I got a little too far from shore. I should start getting back just in case.)
(Oh no, I got a cramp in my left ass cheek, it hurts so much, I can't move my leg.)
(I can't continue to swim, I'm gonna drown.)
(I didn't even get to see my dad again since he left for cigarettes 18 years ago.)
